title: I can't get my account
body: Hello ! Yesterday, I made up a PBE account, i wrote my username and password ( My acc was eligible with the PBE requierments ) then I downloaded PBE. I entered in the launcher, wrote the username and password but the launcher kept telling me that Username or password is incorrect try again... I made sure more than once that i wrote it correctly, but still didn't worked out. So i pressed reset your password. I entered my username there for the reset, it said that a reset mail was send to my email address. I checked my email adress still nothing. I said ok let's wait 5-10 minutes. I waited... Still nothing, i tried again... still nothing, then I pressed Forgot your username where it said that i have to put my email for the reset ( or whatever happens ) so i entered it... I checked my email but still nothing... Please help me i don't know what to do

replies.body: Sorry for the hassle here to get your account up.  Reach out to us through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416), and our account team will work with you and locate your PBE account.  We'll get back to you as soon as we can!

Already done that twice... But nothing... Riot Blitzcrank bot or whatever is it called keep on replying... Nevermind i think i lost my account in the first day i made it ;-; My Username for the account was : chendecristi33 but myeah
